review.comment: Really good service from Affinity Financial, polite and good communication from Rhys Young who guided and advised us on our mortgage on our first property. would highly recommend this service and would use again.

Me and my family bought our first home & we used Affinity Financial. The help and support through the whole process was incredible. To anyone looking to buy a house I would strongly recommend using AFFINITY FINANCIAL.
A fantastic service from start to finish with the guys at Affinity Financial. Thank you once again , highly recommended!

Fantastic service, goes one step further than other companies I've used previously. Very helpful and always available for information.
Highly recommended 👌

Rhys Young was our mortgage advisor and we feel that he was really supportive in his service to us. He proved to be very knowledgeable. He took into consideration that we are first time buyers. He has been honest and given us the necessary truths about how things work, things that people might not be clued up on. Everything from how to handle estate agents and solicitors to advice with how to spend money and handle contracts.

Rhys is also flexible and works around his clients and he makes the process less daunting.

Rhys has been worth every penny and we're glad he'll still be helping set up our insurances and future remortgage advice. Great job!

Rhys has been amazing with my remortgage application. It’s been a really swift process hassle free. Rhys has kept me updated through out and has been extremely prompt with completing documentation and sending documents over to myself. Rhys has responded to any queries regardless of it being outside of working hours. Rhys made this process much easier and less hassle then my initial mortgage application with an alternative company and I felt like I was much more informed about this application thanks to Rhys. 5 star service. Rhys was great with helping me with recommendations for solicitors and surveyors. An all round great service.
Brilliant company with exceptional knowledge. They made our lives so much easier and I will be using AFFINITY again in the future.

We had a very positive experience with Affinity Financial. Always there to answer all our questions  and responded instantly. We definitely will be using them again and would recommend them. Thanks very much for a great service
We've just completed a remortgage with Rhys and he was professional, efficient and always happy to assist with any queries. Highly recommended!

We received first class service from Rhys on our mortgage and life insurance. He went above and beyond from the first to the final day and could not do enough for us at every stage of the process. Having used other brokers in the past it's fair to say that the level of dedication, honestly and diligence he has shown sets him apart. I would have no hesitation recommending him to family and friends.

The team at Affinity Financial were great to deal with. Always responsive to my questions and took the time to present various mortgage options based on what I needed. Very personable service which is always good. Would highly recommend
Very helpful when I spoke with them around a complex buy to let property .

Very informative and answered every question I had. Also found me a great deal compared to other quotes I received. Highly recommend and I will definitely be using them again.

Cymorth arbennig, diolch!

Used Affinity for my mortgage and life insurance.

Great service, really friendly but still professional they managed to secure a great rate with a top lender.

Really impressed and definitely recommend!

Thank you, will be back when it’s time for a remortgage.

Massive thanks to the gents in the office for helping to arrange my life insurance.

Amazing customer service and happy to help with other queries, will 100% be using for my mortgage in the future.

Excellent service received with my mortgage and life insurance arrangements.

Professional and extremely informative throughout. They went above and beyond from the outset and responded to all queries and emails quickly. Really grateful for all the knowledge and expertise shown by my adviser.

I would highly recommend their service and will without a doubt be using them in the future for my remortgages.

Diolch!
